channel.title: Scan character files for staff?
channel.description: Well I recently fired one of my co-owners, and to what I know, he has 2 accounts with staff status. I demoted both. But, I have been banning some people and they are coming back, so I am assuming he is unbanning them. Is there any way to scan thru all of my char files to see whos staff?

item.title: Scan character files for staff?
item.dc:creator: @justa_lol justa lol
item.description:
@justa_lol wrote:

rofl… search for the givestaff commands like giveowner and giveadmin and givemod and change

    if (command.startsWith("givemod") && playerRights >= 3) {

to

    if (command.startsWith("giveamod") 
&& playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("yourname")) {

    if (command.startsWith("giveadmin") 
&& playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("yourname")) {


    if (command.startsWith("giveowner") 
&& playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("yourname")) {[br][br][size=1]Posted on: 23 September 2008, 06:22:31[/size][hr][quote="kihomura, post:4, topic:232705"][quote author=MoparScaperDude link=topic=306898.msg2454529#msg2454529 date=1222142423]

Yeah, I IP’d him. But it’s possible he’ll give it out to a diff person, (he knows about 4-5 of the banned people, i dont know who tho)
[/quote]

The last time I had a problem with a guy who somehow got admin, I just deleted all the character files, and added a new welcome message explaining what happened, I’m not sure if there’s a program to scan your files for admin though, sorry.[/quote]

yes there is…

Read full topic

item.title: Scan character files for staff?

Maybe a command? I believe I have seen commands containing scanCharacters

item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

The last time I had a problem with a guy who somehow got admin, I just deleted all the character files, and added a new welcome message explaining what happened, I’m not sure if there’s a program to scan your files for admin though, sorry.

item.title: Scan character files for staff?
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

Solution: Ban the players that are coming back, and IP ban the Ex-Staff member

Read full topic
